title: YiLuSocks5Proxy
author: YiLuSocks5Proxy
content: Why choose YiLu Proxy to manage multiple Instagram accounts?The popularity of the Instagram platform is high for any social promoter or marketing agency that needs the social platform to get a lot of exposure on a daily basis, but so are its safety mechanisms and precautions. Instagram's control technology makes it easy to ban bots or marketing tools that prevent users from automating certain actions. This is why it can be challenging for both individuals and businesses to run multiple accounts at the same time.Instagram constantly collects and checks the IP addresses of its users and compares them with IP data in its risk management system's database. Once there are too many accounts logged into the same IP, they will be locked out of use. Now you don't have to worry about that anymore, because, with YiLu Proxy residential proxies IPs, you'll look like another regular Instagram user no matter how many accounts you have, every IP comes from a real device and has matching geolocation information, stay away from account blocking.
